customhtml2.customHTML:
The New Paradigm 7

The New
Paradigm 7

Not your dad's support shoe.

New stylish look. Same sturdy support. The new Paradigm 7 features a fresh redesign with a light and luxurious midsole, Guiderail™ technology, and the space you need for a natural foot position.

Shop Women's
Shop Men's

Hey, Good Lookin'

This modern redesign features an engineered mesh upper for breathability and ghillie lacing
for a confident and secure fit. Molded heel construction with plush detailing and premium
lining materials encourages a soft step-in feel. Who knew support could be so sleek?

This modern redesign features an engineered mesh upper for breathability and ghillie lacing for a confident and secure fit. Molded heel construction with plush detailing and premium lining materials encourages a soft step-in feel. Who knew support could be so sleek?

Light and Luxurious

The new Paradigm 7 features 30 mm of updated Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam. Light on
the weight but heavy on the comfort, this midsole is responsive and luxurious with every
supportive step. Our Standard FootShape™ Fit gives your toes the space they need to
spread out and achieve natural foot position.

The new Paradigm 7 features 30 mm of updated Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam. Light on the weight but heavy on the comfort, this midsole is responsive and luxurious with every supportive step. Our Standard FootShape™ Fit gives your toes the space they need to spread out and achieve natural foot position.

Desperately Seeking Support

Our unique GuideRail™ technology offers medical guidance, but only when you need it. Think of
it like train tracks for your feet, encouraging natural foot placement. Your shoes will focus on
your feet so you can focus on your run.

Our unique GuideRail™ technology offers medical guidance, but only when you need it. Think of it like train tracks for your feet, encouraging natural foot placement. Your shoes will focus on your feet so you can focus on your run.
